item.title: [Scar]Learn Basics of Finnish
item.dc:creator: @vaeltaja vaeltaja
item.description:
@vaeltaja wrote:

En usko että suunnilleen 3-4 vuotias vauva ymmärtäisi mitään passiiveista ja muusta, tosin… Ei niitä siinä varsinaisesti opetettu.
Noin kun jatkat niin saadaan suomen sanakirja vielä jossain vaiheessa valmiiksi. Sanoisinko jopa jo ensi vuosituhannella. Suomi on vaikea kieli, kun prepositioita ei käytellä.

I don’t believe that about 3-4 years old baby may understand anything anything about passives and stuff, but… They were not actually teached. If you continue like this we will get Finnish dictionary someday. Like on next millenium. Finnish is difficult language, when there’s no prepositions.

Read full topic

item.title: [Scar]Learn Basics of Finnish
item.dc:creator: @Jei_Jei_KK Jei Jei KK
item.description:
@Jei_Jei_KK wrote:

Ok, they are really BASICS!

In script, it explains

-I…-We
-You…-You
-He/She…-They

Bit more, I’m not so sure how to explain, but… Check it out!

Edit: If you want any words to be translated, Please make a list, but, no over 50 words.

Please don’t read the script, run it first.
It spoils the “fun”
Basics.
[scar]
program LearnBasicsOfFinnish;
//////////////////////
//Made by Jei jei KK /
//////////////////////
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
// IF YOU WANT ANY WORDS TO BE TRANSLATED,//////////////////////
// please, make a list. It’s easier translate from there, then,/
// PM me on moparisthebest or sythe.org.////////////////////////
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
//Current version is 0.1 //////
//Only present here, yet…//////
////////////////////////////////
{Fun Fact;
This script toke me time to make.}

/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
//Don’t try to say these words yet, you don’t say them like in english.//
//Example. If I say word “Here” with english, and type it ‘finnish-like’/
//You would end writing “Hiö” or “Hiä”///////////////////////////////////
/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
const

// What = 0 // Disabled, Until, I make a list of words i’m gonna translate.
WaitT = 3000; // Milliseconds to wait between each word.
Mwait = 7000; // Other Wait. This should be bigger than WaitT
//^^^^ Does not apply every word.
Procedure Basics;
begin
ClearDebug;
wait(WaitT);
Writeln(‘Firstly, basics.’)
Writeln(’“Minä” Means “Me, or I”’)
wait(waitT);
Writeln(’“Sinä” Means “You”(only one person)’)
Wait(waitT);
Writeln(’“Hän” Means “She, or He”, In finnish, you dont know, if person is female’)
Writeln(’ or male, in this case.’)
Wait(waitT);
Writeln(‘Ok, there was; I, You, She/He.’)
Writeln(‘Now, Multiple persons.’)
Writeln(‘Be sure to read everything, clearing debug.’)
Wait(Mwait);
ClearDebug;
Wait(waitT);
Writeln(’“Me” Means “We”, Simple, Huh?’)
Wait(waitT);
Writeln(’“Te” Means “You”(Multiple persons!)’)
Wait(waitT);
Writeln(’“He” Means “Them” or “They”’)
Wait(WaitT);
Writeln(‘Now you know “I”, “You,” “She/he”, “We”, “You”, “Them”’)
end;

Procedure Present;
begin
ClearDebug;
Writeln(‘What “I” do.’)
Writeln(‘Correct me if i spelt wrong the “present”.’)
Writeln(‘It should mean, thing what (I, or others) do RIGHT NOW.’)
Wait(WaitT);
Writeln(‘In finnish, you add things to end of the verb, depends on who does, and when.’)
Writeln(‘Be sure to read, Clearing debug.’)
Wait(Mwait);
ClearDebug;
Wait(WaitT);
Writeln(‘Example.’)
Wait(WaitT);
Writeln(‘minä kirjoitaN’)
Writeln(‘See the N? normally, passive, or whatever would be’)
Wait(waitT);
Writeln(‘KirjoitTaA’)
Writeln(‘In finnish, you strech(Whatever) the words.’)
Writeln(‘Kirjoittaa= Write.’)
Writeln(’(Minä)Kirjoitan= (I) Write, or (I Am Writing)’)
Wait(WaitT);

Wait(Mwait);

ClearDebug;
Writeln(‘Now, What “You” (one person) do’)
Wait(waitT);
Writeln(‘Now you know about streching words, so im not gonna explain again.’)
Writeln(‘Example.’)
Wait(waitT);
Writeln(‘sinä syöt’)
Writeln(‘Read upper part of streching.’)
Wait(WaitT);
Writeln(’(Sinä)Syöt= (You)Eat, or (You)(are) Eating’)
Writeln(‘Passive for “Syöt” would be “Syödä”.’)
Wait(WaitT);

Wait(Mwait);

ClearDebug;
Writeln(‘Now, What “She/He” does.’)
Wait(waitT);
Writeln(‘Streching words, you know that.’)
Writeln(‘Example of this.’)
Writeln(‘Hän lukee’)
Wait(WaitT);
Writeln(’(hän)lukee= (He/She)Reads, or (He/She) Is Reading’)
Writeln(‘Passive would be “lukea”’)
Wait(WaitT);

Wait(Mwait);
ClearDebug;
Writeln(‘Now, what “We” Do.’)
Wait(WaitT);
Writeln(‘Example.’)
Writeln(‘Me katsomme’)
Wait(WaitT);
Writeln(’(me)Katsomme =(we)(are)Watching’)
Writeln(‘Passive for “Katsomme” would be’)
Wait(WaitT);
Writeln(’“Katsotaan”’)
wait(WaitT);

Wait(Mwait);
ClearDebug;
Writeln(‘Now, what “You” Do(Multiple persons)’)
Wait(WaitT);
Writeln(‘Again, example…’)
Writeln(‘Te piirrätte’)
Wait(WaitT);
Writeln(’(te)Piirrätte =(You)(are)Drawing.’)
Writeln(‘Passive for “Piirrätte” Would be’)
Wait(WaitT);
Writeln(‘Piirretään’)
Wait(WaitT);

Wait(Mwait)
ClearDebug;
Writeln(‘Now, What “They” do.’)
Wait(WaitT);
Writeln(‘Example.’)
Writeln(‘He pelaavat.’)
Wait(WaitT);
Writeln(’(he)Pelaavat =(they)(Are)Playing’)
Writeln(‘Passive for “Pelaavat” would be’)
Wait(WaitT);
Writeln(‘Pelataan’)
Wait(WaitT);
Writeln(‘Ok, Now you know the basics.’)
Writeln(‘You understand finnish now good as…’)
Wait(WaitT);
Writeln(’…3-4 year old baby, maybe less.’)
end;

begin
ClearDebug;
Basics;
Present;

end.
[/scar]

Words, make a list to get yours here
[scar]program Words;
///////////////////////
//Made by Jei jei KK///
///////////////////////
const
//Wordlist= 0; Disabled until more wordlists coming.
WaitT= 3000;// Time to wait between words
procedure Things; // This should be wordlist 1.
begin
Writeln(‘LaBo Asked for these words.’)
Wait(WaitT);
Writeln(’-Hello, Hi.’)
Writeln(‘Terve, or Moi’)
Writeln(‘Terve, Is used too as “Healthy, or “Not Sick””’)
Writeln(‘So, I prefer “Moi”.’)
Writeln(’’)
Wait(WaitT);
Writeln(’-Thanks=Kiitos’)
Wait(WaitT);
Writeln(’-Day =Päivä’)
Wait(5000);
Cleardebug;
Writeln(’-Night=Yö’)
Wait(WaitT);
Writeln(’-Bad=Paha.’)
Writeln(’“Paha” means too “Evil”.’)
Writeln(’’)
Wait(WaitT);
Writeln(’-Good=Hyvä.’)
Wait(WaitT);
Writeln(’-Yes= Kyllä, or “Joo”’)
Writeln(‘At least in our town, we use “Joo” more than “Kyllä”’)
Writeln(’’)
Wait(WaitT);
Writeln(’-No= Ei’)
Wait(WaitT);
Writeln(‘If you have any more words, please make a list, to me’)
end;
begin
Cleardebug;
Things;
end.[/scar]

Read full topic
